attributes.review: I downloaded this app for updates on our President Trump’s campaign. My phone was completely fine before downloading it. After using the app, my phone was glitching and the screen was freezing. I really wanted to use this app, but unfortunately, I don’t think it’s worth it. There’s something seriously wrong and needs a lot more improvements, but it’s so bad that I think it might as well be DELETED FOR GOOD
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!

attributes.review: I genuinely can’t believe how poorly this app runs it is infuriating to use and also glitches and shutdowns and makes my phone start acting weird. Once I deleted the app my phone worked normal again. This app steals any information that could be in your phone and sells it I’ve had HUNDREDS of emails, texts, phone calls from spam accounts. Wish I never downloaded the app in the first place.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!

attributes.review: This is one of the worst apps I have downloaded, it had so many glitches that I couldn’t even use it. Apparently this happens to a few people, I learned that from reading the reviews, but I guessed it wouldn’t happen to me because it was only a few people. But I was completely wrong, it happened multiple times when I tried to use the app.
attributes.title: Too Many Glitches

attributes.review: THIS APP IS TERRIBLE!!! As a certified Karen, we do not claim this app. It kept on saying Trump 2020 BUT I DID NOT WANT THAT. So I called the manager and guess what they said... they said “calm down” CALM DOWN?!? CALM DOWN?!?!?!! I WILL NOT CONDONE THIS TYPE OF BEHAVIOR IN AN APP THAT PEOPLE HAVE USED! Then I wondered who in the HELL put the muffins in the freezer, but then I realized... IT WAS THE MANAGER. THE MANAGER PUT THE MUFFINS IN THE FREEZER. I STILL DON’T UNDERSTAND WHY IT SAID “Trump2020” ON THE FRONT OF IT. I WANTED IT TO SAY “Settle for Biden 2020”. Needless to say, this app is terrible I would not recommend it to anyone.
attributes.title: DON’T DOWNLOAD YOU WILL GET DEPORTED!!

attributes.review: This app ruined my life. It really does look like the best app in its own way but i was the best thing i is a way of saying you love it omg  was the time to be nice to see you and then you went last time and then we got a good time and then you went last time and you were never gonna it is so good omg is that one of the best things to happen is to that one you have a little . 10/10 do not recommend
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: this app is literally a waste of time like what’s the point. it’s design is ugly and confusing, i DO NOT like the colors. i also don’t support what this app stands for, like cmon, republicans??? donald trump??? ugh disgusting. itunes get your act together and throw 🧚‍♀️ this ❤️ away🥰 i will not stand by. tiktok may be selling my info to china but so what, are they going to come to my house? i don’t think so. plus i have nothing to lose 💕🥰❤️🧚‍♀️✨🤩😍🥺 xoxoxo gen z
attributes.title: ugh horrible

attributes.review: When I tried to download this app, I got swung by my hair from my phone . This app repeatedly has dragged me to the curb and took my child outside just to punt it. This app is so scary and repeatedly shows disgusting pictures of a rotten looking orange. I am terrified and so are my family. ALSO the owner of the app has force fed me cheese sticks and had roaches and opera singing  rats invade my home with my child. Very gross do not download. (Or vote for him) 😹😹😹
attributes.title: This app is disgusting!!🙄😒

attributes.review: This was the worst app I’ve ever seen and downloaded in my life. It’s completely ridiculous, it lags so much, caused my pet fish to die, and my phone started glitching right after I downloaded it.  My life has gone downhill after opening this app only once, I’m sure it’s cursed or something. The creators of this app should be put in a mental institution because they don’t know what they’re doing.
attributes.title: the app is utterly useless

attributes.review: I was very very unhappy when I opened the app and saw a dried up Cheeto puff 🤬. It was horrifying and I am scarred for life. Later when I was scrolling through the app I came across the Cheeto puff AGAIN😭 except this time it was getting a spray tan witch I thought was very inappropriate. It also showed a lot of NAKED pictures of frogs with boobys! And I was like no❤️ so I scurryed off the app so fast. I definitely don’t recommend downloading this app.
attributes.title: Worst app ever !!!!! 😡🤬😤🤮🤢
